title: Create a Publication Plan
description: A medical publications manager needs to create a strategic publication plan for a product based on upcoming data readouts.

tasks.description: Identify all ongoing and planned clinical trials for the product and their expected completion dates.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent generates a timeline of upcoming data milestones.

tasks.description: Identify key scientific conferences and journals relevant to the product's therapeutic area.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a list of target congresses and journals.

tasks.description: Develop a strategic plan that maps each data readout to a target publication or presentation.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a comprehensive plan, including abstracts, posters, and manuscripts.

tasks.description: Track the execution of the plan in a publication management software.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent enters all planned publications into the system to track their status.
